weka.classifiers.rules.vfdr

Class GaussianAttributeStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.rules.vfdr.AttributeStats
      • weka.classifiers.rules.vfdr.GaussianAttributeStats
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GaussianAttributeStats
extends AttributeStats
implements java.io.Serializable
    Attribute stats for numeric attributes. It fits a Gaussian distribution to the observed distribution of values.
    Version:
    VFDR-Base
    Author:
    Cl√©ment Fournier (clement.fournier@insa-rennes.fr)

        public CandidateAntd bestCandidate(ExpansionMetric expMetric,
